name: zynapse
description: A TypeScript library providing a schema-based API system with type-safe server implementations

scripts.build: tsgo -p tsconfig.build.json && bun run fix-cli-shebang && bun run copy-template
scripts.fix-cli-shebang: echo '#!/usr/bin/env bun' | cat - dist/cli/index.js > dist/cli/index.js.tmp && mv dist/cli/index.js.tmp dist/cli/index.js && chmod +x dist/cli/index.js
scripts.copy-template: cp src/schema/useWebSocket.ts dist/schema/useWebSocket.ts && cp src/schema/useWebsocketMobile.ts dist/schema/useWebsocketMobile.ts
